item.title: Memory Lost in the Red Whoody
item.description: Sound Design for the game Memory Lost in the Red Whoody, a point and click game developed in 48 hours for the Global Game Jam 2021. Story: Rose, wants to visit her Grandma after a long period of COV-19 where everybody was locked down for several weeks. But as soon as she tries to open the door, the old person doesn’t want to hear a word and won’t open the door to strangers.

item.title: Inducing Flow in Board Games Through Augmented Audio
item.description: In the link below you can find my thesis for my master’s degree in Multimedia with major in sound design and interactive music. Abstract: “Games provide high levels of enjoyment and fun. The flow state is an optimal state of absorption in an activity that leads to enjoyment and fun. Modern board games provide good gaming experiences however it is possible to use various resources to further enhance the experience.
